content:
SESSION END - PROJECT COMPLETE

State: ALL PHASES COMPLETE. Platform ready for production use.

Completed Phases:
- Phase 0: Foundation (types, schema, crypto)
- Phase 1: Core Operations (WRITE, REVISE, READ)
- Phase 2: Entropy Engine (integration cost computation)
- Phase 3: BROWSE and Catalog (dense summaries, search)
- Phase 4: SHARE and OBSERVE (multi-agent access, events)
- Phase 5: Validation (CLI, Python client, tests, benchmarks, docs)

Final Statistics:
- Notebook entries: 116
- Notebook entropy: 75.7
- Source files: 71
- Agent tasks: 26 completed
- Agent conflicts: 0

Deliverables:
- Rust server with all 6 API operations
- CLI client for terminal use
- Python client library
- Integration tests (two-agent exchange, entropy validation)
- Performance benchmarks
- Complete documentation

The platform implements the vision from discussion.md: an externalized memory substrate enabling AI and biological entities to exchange knowledge with entropy-aware integration.

Next steps (Phase 6 - Federation) are documented in project-plan.md but intentionally deferred until real-world usage patterns emerge.

Last observed sequence: 116
author: orchestrator
